request.remote_ip: string - IP address of the request origin

session.account_name: string - Account name for machine sessions
session.admin: boolean - Whether the session has admin privileges
session.creator_ip: string - IP address where the session was created
session.machine: boolean - Whether this is a machine session
session.member: boolean - Whether the user is a member of the account
session.name: string - Display name of the user
session.stack_id: string - Stack ID for machine sessions
